section.title: Order by Path or Name

warning.para: Order by jcr:path or jcr:name does not supported.

section.para: There is two ways to ordering results, when path may be used as criteria:

listitem.para: order by property with value type NAME or PATH (jcr supports it)
order by jcr:path or jcr:name - sort by exact path or name of node (jcr do not supports it)

section.para: If no order specification is supplied in the query statement, implementations may support document order on the result nodes (see jsr-170 / 6.6.4.2 Document Order). And its sorted by order number.
By default (if query do not contains any ordering statements) result nodes is sorted by document order.
section.programlisting: SELECT * FROM nt:unstructured WHERE jcr:path LIKE 'testRoot/%'
